shortdef: resembling or suggestive of a lemon

dt: {bc}an acid fruit that is botanically a many-seeded pale yellow oblong berry produced by a small thorny citrus tree ({it}Citrus limon{/it}) and that has a rind from which an aromatic oil is extracted
{bc}something (such as an automobile) that is unsatisfactory or defective

art.capt: lemon 1: branch with fruit and flowers

et: Middle English {it}lymon{/it}, from Middle French {it}limon{/it}, from Medieval Latin {it}limon-, limo{/it}, from Arabic {it}laymūn, līmūn{/it}, from Persian {it}līmū, līmun{/it}
shortdef: an acid fruit that is botanically a many-seeded pale yellow oblong berry produced by a small thorny citrus tree (Citrus limon) and that has a rind from which an aromatic oil is extracted
something (such as an automobile) that is unsatisfactory or defective
